body:
Is to meet them personally in real life!
I AM HOSTING ANOTHER MEETUP, THIS TIME IN SYDNEY!
Info can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4MeFIaZPhNs

Any questions you have for me, feel free to ask!
Details:
Date: Saturday 28th June @ Centennial Park Cafe. Starting at 10:00am and finishing midday
